files.help: export WGETRC="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/wgetrc" and add the following as an alias for wget: wget --hsts-file="$XDG_CACHE_HOME/wget-hsts", or set the hsts-file variable with an absolute path as wgetrc does not support environment variables: echo hsts-file \= "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/wget-hsts >> "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/wgetrc"

export WGETRC="$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/wgetrc" and add the following as an alias for wget: wget --hsts-file="$XDG_CACHE_HOME/wget-hsts", or set the hsts-file variable with an absolute path as wgetrc does not support environment variables: echo hsts-file \= "$XDG_CACHE_HOME"/wget-hsts >> "$XDG_CONFIG_HOME/wgetrc"
